Michael B. Smith â€“ Vice President Business Development and Administration

Mike joins Stillwater Supercomputing as the VP of Business Development and Administration. Prior to joining Stillwater, he was an executive for MetLife China with responsibility for business development and national sales. Mikeâ€™s close ties to the China market will be critical component within our business development strategy. In addition, Mike has many years of financial, operational and business experience within the Financial Services and IT industry with a focus on building business solutions which maximize organizational efficiency and leverage emerging technology.

Mike holds an MBA from St. Louis University with a focus on Healthcare and Health Care delivery. His undergraduate degree is in Microbiology from the University of Notre Dame.
